name: Bleeding Strike
book: Pathfinder Adventure Path #77: Herald of the Ivory Labyrinth © 2014, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: You imbue a slashing melee weapon with the ability to create a bleeding wound. As a free action when the weapon hits a living creature, the wielder can discharge this spell to add 1 point of bleed damage to the weapon’s base damage. This bleeding is difficult to stop; add your spellcasting ability modifier (Wisdom for clerics, and so on) to the DC to stop the bleeding.
target_zh: 接触到的一把近战挥砍武器
duration_zh: 1轮/等级 或 直至能量发散
text_zh: 你赋予一把近战挥砍武器制造出血伤口的能力。当武器击中生物时，持用者可以以一个自由动作释放这个法术，在武器的基础伤害上增加1点流血伤害。这种流血是很难止住的：在止血的DC上加上你的施法属性调整值（牧师为感知，依此类推）。
